text: An earthquake, about moment magnitude () 6.2, hit the Durand Line, between Afghanistan and Pakistan on 22 June 2022 at 02:24 Afghanistan Time (UTC+4:30). The earthquake destroyed many houses in Afghanistan. It was felt in the southern parts of India and Pakistan's capital Islamabad and eastern Punjab province. At least 1000 people were killed and 1500 were injured. ==Related pages== *January 2022 Afghanistan earthquake ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2022 earthquakes June earthquake Category:2020s earthquakes in Asia June 2022 earthquake Category:June 2022 events
title: June 2022 Afghanistan earthquake
